page.title: HAI Use Case: User securely authenticates and gets an open session

revision.text:
[[Category:HAI]] '''Point Of Contact:''' ''[[User:ndp | Nathan Potter]]''
== Description == A user authenticates with a Hyrax server and gets a session.
== Goal == Provide user identification information to Hyrax/Tomcat in order to allow Hyrax Admin's to manage access to datasets.
== Summary == * A user attempts to access a restricted part of the Hyrax server. * The server presents an authentication challenge. * The user provides credentials. * The user is granted access.
== Actors == * User - typically software, either an automation or something driven by a human (like a browser) * Hyrax
== Preconditions == * The user want to access data held in a Hyrax server. * The Hyrax server has been configured to consider this data restricted.
== Triggers == The user attempts to access the restricted data set on Hyrax.
== Basic Flow == # A user attempts to access a restricted part of the Hyrax server. # The server returns an authentication challenge. # The user provides credentials. # The user is granted access.
== Alternate Flow == # A user attempts to access a restricted part of the Hyrax server. # The server returns an authentication challenge. # The user provides credentials. # The user is denied access.
